Title: Soundcloud Silverlight API
Description: This is an attempt of creating a Silverlight wrapper wrapper for the Soundcload API for use with .NET, Silverlight and Windows Phone 7 Applications.
HomeWiki:
The Soundcloud Silverlight API is aimed at .NET, Silverlight and Windows Phone 7 Developers.
The API will allow you to develop applications talking to and working with http://soundcloud.com.

There are currently 3 different libraries planned:
  • .NET Library (for Windows Applications)
  • Silverlight Library (for Silverlight Applications)
  • WP7 Library (for Windows Phone 7 Applications)

The project is in the early planning phase, so that might chance over time.
